work.intro: Each project presented unique challenges and required thoughtful solutions. These case studies demonstrate how structured approach and technical expertise solve real business problems.

case_studies.title: Custom Shopify Integration for Growing Retailer
case_studies.problem: Manual inventory management across multiple sales channels was creating errors and wasting hours of staff time daily. Stock levels were frequently wrong, leading to overselling or missed sales opportunities.
case_studies.approach: Analyzed their existing workflow, identified automation opportunities, and designed a custom integration connecting Shopify with their warehouse management system. Built automated sync for inventory, orders, and customer data.
case_studies.solution: Developed a real-time integration that updates inventory across all channels automatically. Created custom dashboard for monitoring sync status and handling edge cases. Implemented error logging and notifications.
case_studies.outcome: Reduced order processing time by 80%, eliminated stock discrepancy errors completely, freed up 15 hours of staff time per week, and increased sales by removing stock inaccuracies that were preventing purchases.

case_studies.title: Dashboard Redesign for Analytics Platform
case_studies.problem: Users found the existing dashboard confusing and couldn't find the data they needed. This led to high support ticket volume, frustrated users, and increased churn during trial period.
case_studies.approach: Conducted user research to identify pain points, reorganized information architecture based on actual user workflows, created new data visualization system, and simplified navigation structure.
case_studies.solution: Rebuilt entire frontend with improved data visualization, intuitive navigation, customizable views, and better performance. Implemented responsive design for mobile access and added contextual help.
case_studies.outcome: Support tickets decreased by 60%, user satisfaction scores increased 35%, time-to-insight improved by 45%, and trial-to-paid conversion rate increased by 22%.

case_studies.title: Website Rebuild for Consulting Firm
case_studies.problem: Outdated website didn't reflect their expertise, was difficult for them to update, loaded slowly, and generated few quality leads. Content was disorganized and navigation was confusing.
case_studies.approach: Created clear content strategy focused on demonstrating expertise, designed professional interface that matches their brand positioning, built with modern CMS for easy updates, optimized for performance and SEO.
case_studies.solution: Developed new website with clean design, clear service descriptions, case study showcase, blog platform, and contact forms. Implemented fast-loading architecture and mobile-optimized design.
case_studies.outcome: Page load time decreased from 8s to 1.5s, organic search traffic increased 180%, qualified contact form submissions increased 240%, and client reported website now accurately represents their brand.

case_studies.title: API Development for Integration Platform
case_studies.problem: Customers needed to integrate their platform with dozens of third-party tools, but manual integration development was slow and expensive. Each new integration took weeks to build.
case_studies.approach: Designed flexible API architecture that could handle various integration patterns, created developer-friendly documentation, built testing tools, and implemented monitoring and error handling.
case_studies.solution: Developed RESTful API with comprehensive documentation, built SDK for common languages, created sandbox environment for testing, and implemented usage analytics dashboard.
case_studies.outcome: New integrations now take days instead of weeks to build, partner ecosystem grew from 5 to 40 integrations in six months, API adoption exceeded targets by 150%, and developer satisfaction score reached 4.8/5.

case_studies.title: Patient Portal Development
case_studies.problem: Manual appointment scheduling and patient communication was overwhelming staff and creating poor patient experience. Patients had no way to access their information online.
case_studies.approach: Designed secure patient portal meeting HIPAA requirements, integrated with existing practice management system, created intuitive interface for non-technical users, and implemented appointment scheduling workflow.
case_studies.solution: Built web portal allowing patients to schedule appointments, view test results, message providers, and update information. Implemented two-factor authentication and encryption for security.
case_studies.outcome: Phone call volume decreased 40%, administrative time spent on scheduling reduced by 25 hours per week, patient satisfaction scores increased 30%, and no-show rate decreased 15%.

case_studies.title: Donation Platform and CRM Integration
case_studies.problem: Donation process was cumbersome, donor data was scattered across systems, and they had no way to track donor engagement or run effective fundraising campaigns.
case_studies.approach: Streamlined donation flow to reduce friction, integrated payment processing with CRM system, built donor dashboard for managing contributions, and created automated thank-you and receipt system.
case_studies.solution: Developed modern donation platform with one-click recurring donations, integrated Stripe for payments, connected with their CRM for donor tracking, and built reporting dashboard for fundraising team.
case_studies.outcome: Average donation amount increased 35%, recurring donor conversion improved 50%, processing time for donations reduced from hours to minutes, and campaign effectiveness improved through better donor data.
